name: Food Splats
description:
The food monsters are fighting you! Use your ketchup bottle to defeat them.

_

Animations

  • Animations from Mixamo

Art

  • Fluffle bunny model created by Jordi
  • All the monsters (excluding eyes) is the Food Set by Kwituki
  • Environment assets from Unity Asset Store

Images

  • Heart shaped pizza from Google Images
  • Instructions and logo created using Figma

Music

  • Theme song is NiziU Chopstick Instrumental by Instrumental ID

Sounds

  • Splat sound from Zapsplat
  • Game Over from Zapsplat
  • Win sound from Zapsplat
  • Munch sound from Zapsplat

_

First game creation!
